overview.en: BCU is committed to promoting the popularization of blockchain application and solving the payment efficiency among various platformsLow rate,lack of application depth and other problems, build block chain alliance, achieve payment exchange, technical unity, flow Sharing, application scenarios for each blockchain platform, establish blockchain alliance;
overview.zh: BCU 以推动区块链应用的普及为己任，致力于解决各平台间支付效率低、应用深度不足等问题，打造区块链联盟，实现支付互通、技术统一、流量共享，应用场景为各区块链平台，建立区块链联盟;
